docs.abstract: We are honoring the top 10 winners of our Student STEM Writing Contest by publishing their essays. This one is by Leah Li.
docs.snippet: We are honoring the top 10 winners of our Student STEM Writing Contest by publishing their essays. This one is by Leah Li.
docs.lead_paragraph: This essay, by Leah Li, 14, from Milton Academy in Pearland, Texas, is one of the top 10 winners of The Learning Network’s fourth annual STEM Writing Contest, for which we received over 3,000 entries.

headline.main: Glass Frogs: Clearing the Mystery of Clotting

docs.abstract: It’s not just a dating thing, and it can hurt. A lot. Here are ways to cope — and move forward.

docs.lead_paragraph: In my late 20s, I was ghosted by one of my closest friends.

headline.main: What to Do if a Friend Ghosts You

docs.abstract: The fight has shown the difficult test and legally perilous road facing lawmakers or the White House if they try to enact a national ban on the social media service.
docs.snippet: The fight has shown the difficult test and legally perilous road facing lawmakers or the White House if they try to enact a national ban on the social media service.
docs.lead_paragraph: Lawmakers in Washington are pushing for an outright ban of TikTok on American soil. Montana might beat them to it.

headline.main: A Plan to Ban TikTok in Montana Is a Preview for the Rest of the Country

docs.abstract: The basketball star, who was detained for 10 months, said she hoped her book would raise awareness about other Americans who had been wrongfully detained abroad.
docs.snippet: The basketball star, who was detained for 10 months, said she hoped her book would raise awareness about other Americans who had been wrongfully detained abroad.
docs.lead_paragraph: The basketball star Brittney Griner is working on a memoir about her nearly 10 months behind bars in Russia, she said on Tuesday, adding that she hoped the book would help raise awareness about other Americans who had been wrongfully detained abroad.

headline.main: Brittney Griner Is Writing a Memoir About Her Detention in Russia

docs.abstract: Known for its viral videos of politicians and other newsmakers, NowThis is preparing to cover the 2024 election as an independent company.
docs.snippet: Known for its viral videos of politicians and other newsmakers, NowThis is preparing to cover the 2024 election as an independent company.
docs.lead_paragraph: Vox Media said on Wednesday that it was spinning off NowThis, a news site whose videos regularly go viral on Instagram and TikTok, as an independent media company ahead of the 2024 presidential election.

headline.main: Vox Media Spins Off NowThis, the Viral Politics Site, a Year After Buying It

docs.abstract: The U.S. military is increasing its presence on Guam just as the island’s Chamorro people are trying to strengthen their Indigenous bonds.

headline.main: An Island Under Threat Asks When to Share, and When to Fight
